attributes.description:
MyRide will find the ride of your dreams, supported by exceptional customer service and countrywide delivery of all our new and pre-owned vehicles. Our team has decades of experience in the automotive industry and represents some of the greatest brands in the world. For your peace of mind, we pay attention to the smallest details to provide you with quality vehicles that keep you and your family safe. Our skilled sales staff provide excellent customer service, whilst our in-house finance experts ensure you get the best offer to suit your budget. We encourage test drives and welcome all trade-ins. Contact us today to find your ride with MyRide. We promise to make your vehicle purchasing experience seamless and convenient.
Advertised pricing excludes customary on the road fees of R 8 390, optional mechanical warranty and other value added products.  
Errors and omissions excepted, terms and conditions apply.

USED ALL NEW DISCOVERY 20D 177KW SE A/T 2020 FOR SALE AT LAND ROVER CENTURION IN PRETORIA.

Maintenance Plan until or 100 000Km.
FEATURES Include:  19 " Alloy Wheels,  7 Seats, Air Suspension, All Wheel Drive, Automatic Drive Away Locking, Colour Coded Roof, Daytime Running Lamps, Cruise Control, Tow Bar, Front Fog Lamps, Front Rain Sensor, Full Sized Spare Wheel, InControl Apps, Keyless Entry, Navigation, Reverse Camera, Tinted Glass All Round, Ebony Roof Lining, Sliding Roof, Power Heated Fold Mirrors, Power Tailgate, Park Assist and more...

Price excludes delivery and registration fees.
In-House Finance, Extended Warranty, Service and Maintenance Plans Available.
Countrywide Delivery.
